title: Navratna Pearl Grand Haaram: The 'Ratnaraji' Necklace
materials: Dwt - 6.44). Features a radiant 'Hyderabadi Polish' for enhanced luster.
features: A breathtaking fusion of traditional and contemporary design. This Grand Haaram features a meticulously crafted floral pattern intricately set with the auspicious Navratnas, believed to bring prosperity and well-being. Enhanced with glistening diamonds that frame the vibrant gemstone arrangement and accent the lustrous South Sea pearls, each selected for its perfect roundness and radiant glow. This piece showcases exceptional craftsmanship, reflecting Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage.
colors: White (Diamonds). A harmonious blend of vibrant colors
mirroring the rainbow and symbolizing good fortune.
occasions: and milestone events (like Seemantham). Also perfect for making a statement at high-profile parties and cultural events.
description: This one-of-a-kind Grand Haaram, the 'Ratnaraji' necklace, is a unique combination of cultural significance and modern elegance. The Navratnas hold deep spiritual value, while the South Sea pearls and diamond embellishments add a touch of luxury. Crafted with utmost precision and attention to detail, it's a timeless heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. Each piece is hand-set in Hyderabad and is a unique blend of tradition and exquisite craftsmanship.
